article.title: 22 Amazing open source React projects
article.body: This is a collection of open source apps built with React.JS library. In this observation, we compared nearly 800 projects to pick the top 22. (React Native: 11, React: 11). To evaluate the quality, Mybridge AI considered a variety of factors to determine how useful the projects are for programmers.
